mapper.insert: insert into seller(sellerid, sellerpw, sellername, sellercategory, email, sellerphone) values(#{sellerid}, #{sellerpw}, #{sellername}, #{sellercategory}, #{email}, #{sellerphone})
mapper.select: select sellerid from seller where sellerid = #{sellerid}
select sellerpw from seller where sellerpw = #{sellerpw}
select sellerid from seller where sellerid = #{sellerid}
select s.sellercategory from seller s join store st on s.sellerid = st.sellerid where st.s_num = #{snum}
select s.sellerid from seller s join store st on s.sellerid = st.sellerid where st.s_name = #{storename}
